name: clipboard-history
title: Clipboard History
description: Restore any previous clipboard entry with a hotkey
author: Doji

commands.name: cycle
commands.title: Cycle Clipboard
commands.description: Cycle through recent clipboard entries with repeated presses

preferences.name: maxItems
preferences.title: Max history items
preferences.description: Maximum number of clipboard entries to store

preferences.name: pollInterval
preferences.title: Poll interval (ms)
preferences.description: How often to check for new clipboard content

preferences.name: cycleLimit
preferences.title: Cycle limit
preferences.description: Maximum number of entries to cycle through

preferences.name: cycleTimeout
preferences.title: Cycle timeout (ms)
preferences.description: Time window for consecutive cycle presses before resetting

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
